ProductInfo.Features:
This TV can be paired with LG's fun and intuitive Magic Remote (not included, AN-MR400) that lets you easily select features on your TV with the wave of your hand, the scroll of a wheel or use LG's unique Voice Mate that is capable of recognizing how you naturally speak to change channel, volume or find something to watch
Get rid of multiple remote controls. Your LG Magic Remote (not included, may be purchased separately, AN-MR400) can control your Blu-ray, HTiB, Set-Top-Box and sound bar so you don't have to search for the right remote for each of your different media devices
The Content You Want at Your Fingertips: Access premium content providers like Hulu Plus, Netflix and YouTube direct from your TV. Now you get your favorite movies, TV shows, gaming, apps and more. LG connects you to the content that you and your family want
Share Your Media your way: LG gives you multiple ways to share your photos from your vacation, video from your child's recital or your favorite song to your TV from a compatible device
Lightweight glasses, cool 3D effects and a great picture, LG's Cinema 3D TV can bring all this right into your home. Enjoy easy to use & share 3D glasses, outstanding picture quality and amazing 3D effects - that's what you get with an LG Cinema 3D experience
ProductInfo.Name: LG 47LA6200 47" Class 1080p Cinema 3D Smart TV - Bundle - with Sanus Systems ELM202 6-Outlet Surge Protector, Xtreme Cables HDMI 1.4 Audio/Video 6' Cable for 3D HDTV, & Xtreme Cables 200ml HDTV Deluxe Cleaning Kit
